reviews.review: Great game, 100% would recommend if you're into simulators. In my opinion, no others can match the fun this game provides
OUT STADING VEIWS

Pedal to the metal, hope I don't run out of luck. 
Rollin' down the highway until the break of dawn. 
Driving a truck, with my high heels on.
A real HOO- YAH.

This game is brilliant. The world is beauty and can't wait to get better pc to upp the graphics so i can suck up more of it. Definitely buy this game, if you love trucks this is the game for you!!
The devs should be proud.  Great sim.

I never thought I'd ever be into driving a truck simulator, but it's more than just driving a truck. It brings so much more. Scenery, popup detours, hazards, weather (rain). Playing these games challenges me to follow the rules, not speed, I don't want any violations/tickets. Parking it like a pro and abiding the general rules of the road. This is fun to me, I know for some it may not be though. Of course they'd bring it to the next level by adding even small details of bu splatter on windshield, forcing you to pull over to clean windows, otherwise face the consequences of poor visuals. Harsher weather conditions, perhaps pedestrian crossing to yield to, things like that. But I got this on sale, in 1 week I've already put in 50 hours into the game and loving ever minute of it.
fun

Great game--I find it relaxing to play...would recommend to others looking for a relaxing game who like driving simulators. Would definitely recommend at least a controller, as driving with keyboard controls may be challenging--Currently looking into getting a steering wheel setup in order to make it more realistic.

I got this game on a discount and I did not expect to enjoy it as much as I do! I think it's the perfect game to just open up a playlist and just cruise on a long job. The cool part is that it's still expanding! It can be repetitive which i believe its obvious cause you're a trucker. (duh). But it doesn't take away the relaxing atmosphere. And you can also tweak it to your liking! 8/10

This game is so relaxing to me and I don't even understand trucking at all XD I definitely recommend this to those that just want to travel places and just vibe or if you want the real trucking experience without needing to get a CDL. You can either deal with traffic violations or turn it off in the settings and there are some mods available too. I bought all the DLC's and only need Texas left but even without the DLC's it's awesome ! 10/10 ! <3

Euro and American Truck Simulator are both very good games, but here me out: Do not mod your game. It completely ruins your first time experience. Get the grind up. I love just driving around a random state, because I'm not from America. It's just nice to see the scenery. 

The only con I have about this game is the DLC, and same for EU truck sim. I'm not talking about the little accessories you can get in your car, because they aren't that bad. I'm talking about how you have to pay to access the other half of the map. I think EU sim does it a lot better though because unlike American Truck Simulator, places are actually cut off by water in Euro Truck Simulator.

The mods are amazing though. You can have Gay Lesbian darth vader sit with you while you deliver coconut milk to Las Vegas. 9/10

It is a fun realistic trucking game, but as you progress throughout the game and buy the map('s) DLC. I can take a very long time to truck.

A well  paced and relaxing game, with enough content to give you goals to shoot for.  It's not trying to be anything much more than a simulator, and that allows it to be a pretty excellent simulator.  Normally I'm not a  big fan of base games plus DLC, but you get a lot of content for each DLC, and the attention to detail is pretty decent.
All this said, it's still just a simulator with some shiny things to keep it interesting.  It's not here to 'win'.  The roads you can travel are pretty limited, which is understandable, and things get repetitive after 20-30hrs unless you are buying DLC to keep it fresh.

Overall, buy it and the DLC on sales for 70% off or more and give yourself something to relax playing and enjoying.
